article_title: John G. Taylor: A 3-D view of health care
article_text:
Delivery: How long you wait depends on geography, diagnosis

Deliverance: More folks work in billing than hands-on patient care

Dollars: Prices and billing practices virtually violate the ‘first, do no harm’ oath
